doc.title: Here's What I Like: Fruit. And Now I'll Tell You Why
doc.plot: 'Here's What I Like: Fruit. And Now I'll Tell You Why' is the first instillation of a retro kitchen science comedy series in which our host, Helen Pellet, explains why she likes fruit, assisted by her long suffering maid, Nora Marbles. The wonder of fruit's biodegradable packaging, it's use as decoration, advanced fruit, and processed fruit are discussed. Confusion ensues. Think Julia Child's 'French Chef' meets 1960's school science film with a dash of Lillian Hellman's ' The Children's Hour.'
